subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester City scored four goals in the final 26 minutes to beat Aston Villa, 4-0, moving the team 2 points clear of second-place Liverpool in the Premier League with one game to play.
snippet: Manchester City scored four goals in the final 26 minutes to beat Aston Villa, 4-0, moving the team 2 points clear of second-place Liverpool in the Premier League with one game to play.
